Room.Name: Goblin Guard's Quarter
Room.ShortDescription: You have entered the goblin guard barracks, a large, dirty room.
Room.LongDescription: Several goblins playing dice did not notice as you entered. The room smells like almost all barracks, reeking of bad ale and unwashed bodies. Bedrolls are scattered haphazardly around the room, and a rack of weapons stands in the center of the room. A number of spears, swords and other weapons also lie about. Over in one corner is a pile of broken bottles and moldy garbage, the remains of meals from long ago. Rats run freely throughout the room, and one peers at you from atop the garbage.
